data.name: Americano
data.descriptions: Rich espresso and pure water poured over ice.

data.name: Latte
data.descriptions: Rich espresso and milk poured over ice

data.name: Mocha
data.descriptions: Espresso, chocolate sauce and milk served on ice, topped with whipped cream.

data.name: Yuzu Cold Brew
data.descriptions: The perfectly balanced of Blue Vending Cold Brew and the citrus Yuzu adding a good freshness during the day.

data.name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
data.descriptions: Espresso meets white chocolate sauce, milk, and whipped cream.

data.name: Cold Foam Iced Espresso
data.descriptions: Shaken espresso, poured through creamy nonfat milk cold foam.
